// Registers:
//

//   --------------------------------- ----- ----
//   PackedParameters                  c0       1

//   ImageAdjustments2                 c9       1
//   HalfResMaskRect                   c10      1
//   LightShaftParameters              c11      1
//   AspectRatioAndInvAspectRatio      c12      1
//   TextureSpaceBlurOrigin            c13      1
//   DistanceFade                      c14      1
//   BloomScreenBlendThreshold         c15      1
//   BloomTintAndThreshold             c16      1
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcPos0       c17      1

//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcColor0     c19      1
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcPos1       c20      1
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcSize1      c21      1
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcColor1     c22      1

//   DepthTransition                   c24      1
//   DepthDistances                    c25      1

//   FilterColor1Texture               s1       1

//   DNEHexDofTexture2                 s4       1

//
// Default values:
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcPos0
//     c17  = { 1, 1, 0, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcSize0
//     c18  = { 1, 1.7, 0, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcColor0
//     c19  = { 1, 2, 4, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcPos1
//     c20  = { -1, -1, 1, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcSize1
//     c21  = { 1, 1.7, 0, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesLightSrcColor1
//     c22  = { -1, -1, -1, 0 };
//
//   DNEColorStrokesBackBlendDistances
//     c23  = { 150, 500, 0, 0 };
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, -0.5, 2, 4, 10
    def c4, -0.0500000007, 3, 5, -3
    def c5, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999, 65504
    def c6, 0.5, 1.5, 0.25, 0.0078125
    def c26, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c27, 1, 2, 3, 15
    def c28, 0.001953125, 0.064453125, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_7A7F26C9_0.txt
texldl r8, c220.z, s13
mov r7, c13 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r7.x, r8.x, c220.w, r7.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add r0, c3.x, v1.xyxy
    mov_pp r1.xy, -c17
    mov_pp r1.zw, -c20.xyxy
    mad_pp r0, r0, c3.y, r1
    rcp r1.x, c18.x
    rcp r1.y, c18.y
    rcp r1.z, c21.x
    rcp r1.w, c21.y
    mul_pp r0, r0, r1
    dp2add_pp r0.x, r0, r0, c1.y
    dp2add_pp r0.y, r0.zwzw, r0.zwzw, c1.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.xy, r0, c3.z
    add_pp r0.xy, -r0, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0, r0
    mul r1, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    add r0.z, r1.w, -c2.y
    add r0.w, -r0.z, c1.z
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    cmp r0.z, r0.w, c1.w, r0.z
    mov r2.x, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.w, r2.x, r0.z, -c23.x
    rcp r1.w, c23.y
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.w
    mad r0.w, r0.w, r0.w, -c1.x
    mov_sat_pp r3.x, c17.z
    mov_sat_pp r3.y, c20.z
    mad r2.yz, r3.xxyw, r0.w, c1.x
    mul_pp r0.xy, r0, r2.yzzw
    mul_pp r3, r0.y, c22
    mad_pp r3, c19, r0.x, r3
    add_pp r1, r1.zzxy, r3.w
    add r3, r3.zzxy, c1.x
    mul_pp r4, r1, r3
    max r0.xy, v1.zwzw, c10
    min r2.yz, c10.xzww, r0.xxyw
    texld r5, r2.yzzw, s4
    texld r6, r2.yzzw, s3
    rcp r0.x, r5.w
    mul_sat r5, r0.x, r5.zzxy
    mad r1, r1.yyzw, -r3.yyzw, r5
    mad_pp r0.x, r2.x, r0.z, -c0.x
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.z, c2.x
    min_pp r2.x, r0.y, c5.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.y, r0_abs.x, c0.y
    pow_pp r2.y, r0.y, c0.z
    mov r3.xy, c1
    cmp_pp r0.y, r0.x, c7.y, r3.x
    min_pp r3.z, r2.y, r0.y
    max_pp r0.y, c0.w, r3.z
    cmp_pp r0.z, -r0.x, c1.y, c1.x
    cmp_pp r0.x, r0.x, -c1.y, -c1.x
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.z
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c3.w
    mad_pp r0, r0.x, r1, r4
    add r1, -r0.yyzw, r6.zzxy
    add r2.y, r6.w, c4.x
    mul r2.y, r2.y, c4.y
    mov r2.z, c4.z
    mul r2.z, r2.z, c7.x
    min r3.z, r2.z, c1.x
    mul_sat r2.y, r2.y, r3.z
    mad_pp r0, r2.y, r1, r0
    dp3_pp r1.x, r0.zwyw, c5
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, c4.w
    exp_pp r1.x, r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1.x, c8.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c15.x
    texld r4, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r4, r4.zzxy, c8.zzxy
    mul_pp r4, r4, c3.z
    mad_pp r0, r4, r1.y, r0
    mov r1.zw, c12
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r1.xzww, r7.xxyw
    dp2add r1.y, r1.yzzw, r1.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c3.x
    mov r4.xy, c6
    mad r1.z, c11.w, -r4.x, r4.y
    texld_pp r4, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r1.w, r4.w, r4.w
    mul_pp r4, r4.zzxy, c16.zzxy
    mul r4, r1.x, r4
    lrp r2.y, r1.w, r1.z, c11.w
    lrp r3.z, r1.y, c1.x, r2.y
    mul r1.x, c14.x, c14.x
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c14.x
    lrp_pp r2.y, r1.x, c1.x, r3.z
    mul_pp r0, r0, r2.y
    mad_pp r0, r4, c3.z, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c9.y, c9.x
    rcp r4.z, r1.x
    rcp r4.w, r1.y
    rcp r4.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r4
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c26.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r0.y, r0.y, c27.w, -r0.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c26.w, r1.w
    add r4, r2.x, -c25
    cmp_pp r4, r4, c1.y, c1.x
    mad r3, c25.xxyz, -r3.yxxx, r2.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.xzw, r2.x, c24.w, -c24.xyyz
    cmp_pp r2, r3, r4, c1.y
    dp3_pp r1.z, r2.yzww, c27
    dp3_pp r0.x, r2, r0.xzww
    add_pp r0.z, r1.z, c1.x
    mad r2.x, r1.z, c6.z, c6.w
    mad r3.x, r0.z, c6.z, c6.w
    mov r3.yz, c28.xxyw
    add r3, r1.xyxy, r3.yxzx
    texld_pp r4, r3, s5
    texld_pp r3, r3.zwzw, s5
    lrp_pp r5, r0.y, r3, r4
    mov r2.yz, c28.xxyw
    add r1, r1.xyxy, r2.yxzx
    texld_pp r2, r1, s5
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s5
    lrp_pp r3, r0.y, r1, r2
    add_pp r1, -r3, r5
    mad_pp oC0, r0.x, r1, r3

// approximately 130 instruction slots used (10 texture, 120 arithmetic)
